sentences.english: Termites are a gourmet treat in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 白蚁是非洲人的美味佳肴。

sentences.english: Roast lamb anchors most Greek holiday meals. Special sweet breads are made at Christmas and Easter.
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉是大多数希腊人的节日佳肴。

sentences.english: Gisborne is a city where you can indulge in gourmet dining and wine tasting.
sentences.chinese: 吉斯伯恩是一个让你纵情享受美酒佳肴的城市。

sentences.english: Aser, his bread shall be fat, and he shall yield dainties to kings.
sentences.chinese: 阿协尔的食物肥美，将供给君王的佳肴。

sentences.english: The guests were entertained with all kinds of delicacies.
sentences.chinese: 客人们被飨以各种佳肴。

sentences.english: Many traditional dishes in Japan have a soup base, like miso soup and udon noodles.
sentences.chinese: 日本传统佳肴都会搭配汤类，如味增汤和乌冬面。

sentences.english: And she made a variety of Sichuan dishes easily that even local chefs are impressed.
sentences.chinese: 她淡定地烧出各种四川佳肴，连当地名厨都折服。

sentences.english: Mussel crisp delicious, packet sauce tasty, traditional cuisine of coastal Wenzhou.
sentences.chinese: 淡菜脆嫩鲜香，包汁入味，是温州沿海的传统佳肴。

sentences.english: Mongolia Kaluoxi supply of gourmet cuisine restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 蒙地卡罗西餐厅供应各类美食佳肴。

sentences.english: He wanted to share with us.
sentences.chinese: 他想要跟我们一起分享佳肴。

sentences.english: A good brandy completes a fine meal.
sentences.chinese: 喝点好白兰地酒才使一顿佳肴完美无缺。

sentences.english: The Chinese Restaurant on the second serves an array of delicacies with diversified savors .
sentences.chinese: 酒店二楼中餐厅为您提供各种风味的美食佳肴。

sentences.english: Kobe beef is a Japanese delicacy whose reputation precedes it.
sentences.chinese: 神户牛肉是日本闻名于世的一道佳肴。

sentences.english: He provided local delicacies for his guests' meal.
sentences.chinese: 他用当地的美味佳肴来招待客人。

sentences.english: The wine has no taste. The food sickens you.
sentences.chinese: 美酒索然无味，佳肴令你恶心。

sentences.english: Many of Malay dishes are added Belacan to increase tastes.
sentences.chinese: 许多马来佳肴都会加入峇拉煎来提味。

definition: delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat
delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat
to smell, look and taste great
exotic delicacies/luxury foodstuff from distant locations
dish/lean and hungry look (resulting from vegetarian diet)/emaciated look (from malnutrition)
a dish that goes well with alcoholic drinks
